titleStmt.title: Madrigalls to foure voyces newly published by Thomas Morley. The first booke
Madrigals, voices (4)
titleStmt.author: Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Est in Aldersgate street at the signe of the black horse,

notesStmt.note: Four partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At foot of title, part 1, "Cantus."; part 2, "Altus."; part 3, "Tenor"; part 4, "Bassus.".
Signatures: [A]² B-E⁴ F² ; [A]² B-E⁴ F² ; [A]² B-E⁴ F² ; [A]² B-E⁴ F² .
